programme.title: Fist of Legend
programme.desc: When Chen Zhen studies in Japan, he finds several Chinese students missing and accidentally uncovers the Black Dragon Society’s conspiracy. A new drug is invented to boost bodies of the Japanese troops in war and the Chinese students are used in their experiments. Chen Zhen vows to take down the evil society and destroy their secret laboratory.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Hua’s hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from real events. Detective Lin sets up a special unit to arrest the motorbike robber and the crime syndicate behind the thefts in Foshan. In the process, his pregnant wife is hit by a motorbike robber, leading him to uncover their revenge plan...

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Grey Men 2
programme.desc: Triad boss Song seeks to whitewash his image and seize Laika’s mayoral seat amid a regime change. He faces a funding shortfall despite colluding with officials, and gets his right-hand man and enforcer to commit crimes to boost his funds and power. Just as Song believes success is imminent, the dynamics between the three take an unexpected turn…

programme.title: Punish Evil
programme.desc: A shipment of newly issued currency is robbed by three armed robbers, prompting Detective Chang to investigate. Following new leads, he successfully takes down one of the robbers. Meanwhile, the other two plot to rob a gold factory amidst the chaos. With meticulous planning, Chang thwarts their scheme and brings them to justice.

programme.title: Jaime Labrador, Sakristan Mayor
programme.desc: Jaime Labrador, Sakristan Mayor

programme.title: Hinukay Ko Na Ang Libingan Mo
programme.desc: Vera, a singer in a night club, catches the attention of Mr. Larosa. However, she is already engaged to Anton and completely ignores Larosa's advances.

programme.title: M&M, The Incredible Twins
programme.desc: An unfortunate accident separates twins Marcelo (Jimmy Santos) and Marcelino (Herbert Bautista) at birth. Marcelo is adopted by a poor family while Marcelino grows up with their biological parents.

programme.title: Diego
programme.desc: He is a member of an elite crop in the military. However,when his group decided to stage a coup against the government,he defied his head. What danger lurks in the jungle makes Diego a stark study of human fortitude and courage?

programme.title: Anak Ni Baby Ama (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Baby Ama was a notorious hoodlum sent to the electric chair during the 60's. This movie is a fictionalized account of what life might have been for his son who came to this world already burdened with the memory of his father's life and death.

programme.title: Laglag Barya Gang
programme.desc: Ike Lozada has been given the task to nurture and shelter homeless children. Unable to make ends meet, he taught his children to become street hustlers.

programme.title: Kontra Bandido
programme.desc: Apo Lakay has once rescued Bochok and his sister from the evil clutches of Ka Turing. This time, it is Bochok's turn to rescue the oldman from the same villain. Will he be able to do it?

programme.title: Amo
programme.desc: This action movie tackles the issue of labor union. Starring Rudy Fernandez as Leon delos Reyes.

programme.title: Roberta
programme.desc: Child actress Mumay Santiago gets her biggest break as she portrayed the title role in this remake of the Sampaguita Pictures' classic from the 50's. Roberta is a little girl forced to learn how to fend for herself because of her abusive and irresponsible father and ailing mother. When her mother died, Roberta is forced to live on the streets of the city where despite her many hardships, she managed to maintain a sunny disposition that enchants even strangers.

programme.title: Huwag Mong Isuko Ang Laban
programme.desc: Ex-convict David was working as a cab driver when he came across an attache case filled with money and important papers. He returned this to the owner, who took pity on him and hired him as a driver for his daughter, Cheska.

programme.title: Oscar Ramos, Hitman
programme.desc: Oscar Ramos (Ramon Revilla) is a respected man in the community. He settles disputes and takes up the cudgels for the oppressed. He also has a secret -- an amulet that protects him from bullets. Will his amulet protect him when both the police and Ka Ernie's group hunt him down?

programme.title: Aso't Pusa (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Pamboy (Tito Sotto) risked being beaten to a pulp by Osang's father each time he came to defend the girl. He tried to convince to leave, but Osang (Aiza Seguerra) continued to show her love for her father even after he went into jail.

programme.title: Wrath Of The Titans
programme.desc: Taking place 10 years after his heroic defeat of the Kraken, Perseus (Sam Worthington) embarks on a treacherous quest into the underworld to rescue his father, overthrow the Titans and save mankind.

programme.title: The Mentalist S5 17
programme.desc: The CBI team investigates when the body of a female army medic who worked with soldiers suffering from PTSD is found near a military base.

programme.title: The Mentalist S5 18
programme.desc: The CBI team investigates a death in a local theatre production. Meanwhile, Jane hopes to get more information about Red John from the comatose Jason Lennon.

programme.title: The Legend Of Tarzan (2016)
programme.desc: A new live-action adventure from director David Yates (Harry Potter films) brings Edgar Rice Burroughs' legendary character back to the big screen. It's been years since the man once known as Tarzan (Alexander Skarsgard --True Blood) left the jungles of Africa behind for a gentrified life as John Clayton III, Lord Greystoke, with his beloved wife, Jane (Margot Robbie --The Wolf of Wall Street) at his side. Now, he has been invited back to the Congo to serve as a trade emissary of Parliament, unaware that he is a pawn in a deadly convergence of greed and revenge, masterminded by the Belgian, Captain Leon Rom (Oscar® winner Christoph Waltz). But those behind the murderous plot have no idea what they are about to unleash.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Your mind is the scene of the crime. Box-office superstar Leonardo DiCaprio stars in this contemporary science fiction action film set "within the architecture of the mind." Written, directed and produced by Oscar and Golden Globe nominee Christopher Nolan (The Dark Knight, Batman Begins, The Prestige), this eagerly awaited follow-up to 2008's billion-dollar blockbuster is yet another visionary tale from a startingly original filmmaker who continually raises the bar with every film he makes. Shooting in London, Paris, Tangiers, Calgary and Los Angeles, Nolan's mind-bending film also stars Academy Award winners Michael Caine and Marion Cotillard, in addition to Juno's Ellen Page, Batman Begins' Cillian Murphy and Oscar nominees Ken Watanabe (The Last Samurai) and Tom Berenger (Platoon).

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 8
programme.desc: Our buyers bid big to win a locker packed with what looks like rare art, but will the winner walk away with cash or counterfeits? Then, a dumpy unit sends almost everyone running, but Papa Bear spies a profit. And later, the day's final auction contains expensive looking sky-diving equipment that ignites a sky-high bidding war. But when the dust settles, the winner will unveil a hidden gem that spells a five-figure payday.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 9
programme.desc: Our buyers go head-to-head to score an item that appears to be a covered car. But when the tarp is pulled back, will the winner drive away with a pile of cash or a piece of trash? Then, the legality of a locker's contents is called into question, but Brandon and Lori take a leap of faith and are rattled by what they find. And later, Sean has saved the best for last as our buyers are given the rare opportunity to compete for unclaimed airline luggage. It's an auction of a different breed that ignites a cash spending frenzy.

programme.title: Field To Feast - Episode 6
programme.desc: Thanh sets his focus on another classically Mediterranean vegetable - the artichoke. Along the way he follows the artichoke through Melbourne's largest wholesale produce market and into a local Italian kitchen.

programme.title: Wide Open Spaces - Outback Chefs
programme.desc: The gourmet chefs turned station cooks. In 2018 two retired chefs fulfilled their dream to cook for the hungry crew of an outback cattle station. But for staff used to plain food, there were a few changes needed to the menu.

programme.title: A Brief History Of Cricket Down Under: The 80s - Master Blasters
programme.desc: You can't win a cricket match without scoring a lot of runs, and a special breed of batsmen that did this better than anybody else. Richards, Gower, Haynes, Crowe, Miandad and Gavaskar were the legendary '80s master blasters.

programme.title: Restoration Australia - Tivey Manor
programme.desc: Host Anthony Burke meets a big city couple aiming to bring a slouching country town mansion back to the burnished glory of its gold rush years.

programme.title: Whisper of Silent Body
programme.desc: Renowned as the "corpse whisperer," forensic pathologist Qin Ming uncovers vital clues from the corpses. During a homicide investigation, he unravels a murder case sixteen years ago in the snowy mountain with his assistant and a detective. Together, they unveil the secrets of the mysterious homicide.

programme.title: The Revenge
programme.desc: Ruo Wei returns to her childhood home with two best friends, and reunites with her cousin who has always lived there. While they plan to enjoy their trip, they are constantly haunted by paranormal events, ending up in a terrifying experience with unexpected outcome.

programme.title: Rooftop
programme.desc: A group of friends invites Paul to a secret party on their campus rooftop. When a prank accidentally kills Paul, the friends cover up the incident and promised never to disclose it. Paul vows to take revenge by becoming a vicious ghost to haunt them into taking responsibility for their actions.

programme.title: Creepy Pasta
programme.desc: Trapped in an abandoned house, a young man desperately searches for clues about his trapped situation. The unsettling truth actually lies in a sequence of viral videos and they gradually corrupt his mind…

programme.title: In Cycle
programme.desc: A seemingly happy couple who loves diving come to a deserted island for a diving vacation, which is part of the husband’s plan to murder his wife. His conspiracy however, is intervened by a series of bizarre events on the island. Can the couple eventually escape from the enigmatic ocean?

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after a masked killer brutally murdered all her friends, Camryn struggles to live a normal life as she tries to come to terms with the traumatic experience. Just when she thinks she might be ready to finally start anew, Camryn suspects that the killer has come back for her...

programme.title: Mid-night Two
programme.desc: Yi Cheng and his friends venture into a haunted mountain that hides an ancient corpse and an eternal ghostly flame. No one who enters the mountain ever returns and at 2:30 AM, Yi Cheng’s friends vanish one by one. While searching for them in the eerie forest, Yi Cheng enters a realm of infinite reincarnation, facing a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady
programme.desc: Beautiful Alice has a successful career but is in love with a married man, thus becoming very lonely. She can only find companionship in her cleaning lady Shelly, a mysterious girl whose face is scarred by burns. As they become closer, Alice accidentally discovers Shelly's dark history and is soon embroiled in a horrific act of revenge.

programme.title: Waning Moon
programme.desc: Nuanchan is a famous and highly respected spiritual medium in a rural village in Thailand. She wants to train her niece, Ploy, to succeed her and Ploy needs to remain a virgin. When Ploy falls in love with her childhood friend Tul, their lives are in danger as the secret of the spiritual world is being unveiled.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 26
programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Hindi Pa Tapos ang Laban
programme.desc: Fernando Poe Jr. stars as Carding Villamar, a city professional who returns to their hometown of Evangelista after learning of his brother's untimely demise. As a series of events unfold, he soon discovers that his brother didn't succumb to a heart attack as he was made to believe. He was shot in cold blood for refusing to sell his land to a powerful congressman. With a town muted and crippled by fear, the congressman's henchmen move unhampered to silence Carding and his brother's orphaned family as well. Big mistake. Armed with only a crusty riffle and a whole ton of rage. Carding sets out to right the wrong and exact vengeance for the murder of his brother. That is, if he survives the hot pursuits of bounty hunters, the militia and the police who are all in the congressman's payroll.

programme.title: Sing Galing: Singlebrity Edition ep 16
programme.desc: Sing Galing: Sing-lebrity Edition, aims to provide fun, laughter, music and excitement with the added goal of helping as celebrities sing and play for their chosen beneficiaries.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Bernardo Carpio ep 5
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 10
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Maria Makiling ep 5
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Destiny Guard ep 9
programme.desc: Angels of destiny work as security guards, matching people with their soul mates and making sure they end up together. But what if a female guard falls in love with a man under her watch?

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 6
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

With a town muted and crippled by fear, the congressman's henchmen move unhampered to silence Carding and his brother's orphaned family as well. Big mistake. Armed with only a crusty riffle and a whole ton of rage. Carding sets out to right the wrong and exact vengeance for the murder of his brother. That is, if he survives the hot pursuits of bounty hunters, the militia and the police who are all in the congressman's payroll.
